{{cpp/utility/stacktrace_entry/title|operator bool}}
{{cpp/utility/stacktrace_entry/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=c++23 |
constexpr explicit operator bool() const noexcept;
}}

Checks whether the {{tt|stacktrace_entry}} is non-empty, i.e. it represents an evaluation in a stacktrace.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if the {{tt|stacktrace_entry}} is non-empty, {{c|false}} otherwise.

===Notes===
A non-empty {{tt|stacktrace_entry}} can be obtained from a {{lc|std::basic_stacktrace}} created by {{lc|std::basic_stacktrace::current}} or a copy of such {{tt|std::basic_stacktrace}}.

An empty {{tt|stacktrace_entry}} can be created by the {{rlp|stacktrace_entry|default constructor}}.
